title: Cognitive Apprenticeship-Based Blended Program for Training Healthcare Science Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental medical terminology and scientific inquiry methods
context.additional_context: A course for learning expert thinking processes in a combined environment of clinical simulations, online discussions, and field practicums.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three clinical decision-making processes required in healthcare settings
Learners can analyze complex patient cases with 80% accuracy through expert-learner interactions (coaching/scaffolding)
Learners can perform self-reflective practice journaling and peer feedback at over 90% proficiency using metacognition
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
